glider_ingest.ScienceProcessor module

class glider_ingest.ScienceProcessor.ScienceProcessor(mission_data: MissionData)

Bases: object

A class to process science data from glider missions.

This class handles the loading, processing, and conversion of science data from raw files into a structured dataset, while also performing variable calculations and renaming for consistency.

mission_data

An instance of the MissionData class containing mission-related configurations and data storage.

Type:

MissionData

add_sci_attrs() → Dataset

Add metadata attributes to the variables in the science Dataset. Attributes include accuracy, precision, units, and standard names.

convert_sci_df_to_ds() → Dataset

Convert the processed science DataFrame to an xarray Dataset.

This method adds platform metadata and converts the science DataFrame into a structured xarray Dataset.

Returns:

The science dataset with platform metadata added.

Return type:

xr.Dataset

format_sci_ds() → Dataset

Format the science dataset by sorting and renaming variables.

This method organizes variables and renames them for consistency with the mission dataset’s standards.

Returns:

The formatted science dataset.

Return type:

xr.Dataset

get_sci_vars(variables: list)

Determine the subset of science variables to process based on their presence.

Parameters:

variables (list) – A list of available science variables from the mission data.

Returns:

A list of science variables that are present and should be processed.

Return type:

list

load_science()

Load and process science data from raw mission files.

This method reads raw science data files, filters relevant variables, and computes derived quantities like salinity and density.

Returns:

A DataFrame containing processed science data.

Return type:

pd.DataFrame

mission_data: MissionData
process_sci_data() → Dataset

Perform all processing steps for science data.

This method processes the science data from raw files to a formatted xarray Dataset, including variable calculations and formatting.

Returns:

The processed and formatted science dataset.

Return type:

xr.Dataset
